original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says: Your enemies have laughed at you. They have said, ‘The old mountains now belong to us!’ ”
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시기를 원수들이 네게 대하여 말하기를 아하 옛적 높은 곳이 우리의 기업이 되었도다 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says:
Your enemies have laughed at you.
The old mountains now belong to us!
